title: Pixel 4 in Bahrain!?
content:
Hello, my name is Ahmed I'm from bahrain and I want to get my new Google phone but I don't have it here available in my country so I'm going end of November to the UK I was wondering if I can buy it from the Google store in London or not and how I can't contact the store there I need your help please and I wanted to know if the motion sensors and the radars will work here in Bahrain or not.

Would appreciate your help.
